case.name: Club Rouge Invitation
case.description: Rouge invites the other players to visit Club Rouge, her own personal casino in Central City.

case.name: Favorite Jewel
case.description: Rouge asks what everyone's favorite jewel is.

case.name: Unusual Jewels
case.description: Rouge asks if anyone has information about jewels with unusual properties.

case.name: Secret Gossip
case.description: Rouge offers to spill some harmless secrets about other characters from the Sonic franchise.

case.name: Hobbies for Shadow
case.description: Rouge asks about the other players' hobbies.

case.name: Looting the Room
case.description: In later rounds, Rouge will quietly start purloining increasingly conspicuous jewelry.

case.name: Fondleshy
case.description: Upon invitation, Fluttershy fondles Rouge's breasts. (Note: at the moment, will only play with Sucrose present.)

notes.note: Namely, the Steam edition of Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed, believe it or not.

If you want Amy to further expound on what qualities of Sonic's she finds uniquely attractive, that's a solid direction to take for her response. But if memory serves, Amy's a big believer in things like destiny and fate, and she first ran into Sonic because following her tarot cards led her directly to him. Leaning into that angle could lead into a fun interaction where a skeptical Rouge asks Amy to do a tarot reading to see who her so-called "one true love" is (although admittedly, it may be tricky to pull that off and strip at the same time). ...Of course, if you don't mind branching dialogue paths, there's no reason why we couldn't handle it multiple ways...

Many of Rouge's lines targeting the Amy/Amy fantasies demonstrate an awfully specific knowledge of what Sonic's like in bed. While I tried to avoid wording them in a way that outright confirms that Sonic and Rouge have had sex (alternative explanations include Rouge getting the knowledge second-hand, or that she's blatantly trolling), just let me know if you'd prefer that I delete or rewrite any lines.
By "friends back home," the intent was to exclude Rouge and ~player~ -- but if you can't think of anyone more fitting, it's perfectly fine to default to either of them, or to say nobody at all.

This could go a couple of ways depending on how Amy answers. If she's good for it, then the two of them could talk plans for the outing. But if she doesn't have the disposable income, Rouge could try to talk Amy into working at Club Rouge (as a dealer, waitress, or prize fighter).
Referring, of course, to the events of Forces.

Rouge is, of course, being deliberately ambiguous as to whether she means "smash" in a sexual or an entirely literal sense. Whether Amy falls for the trap - and how any actively-being-written Smash girls want to address the accusation - I leave up to their respective writers.

Rouge is, of course, being deliberately ambiguous as to whether she means "smash" in a sexual or an entirely literal sense. Whether Amy falls for the trap - and how any actively-being-written Smash girls want to address the accusation - I leave up to their respective writers.

Rouge is referring to Sally Acorn, of course. Honestly, even I'm not sure who the second princess is... I don't think it'd be Blaze, and while I'm tempted to say Elise, she and Sonic retconned themselves out of having met each other.

Rouge is referring to Sally Acorn, of course. Honestly, even I'm not sure who the second princess is... I don't think it'd be Blaze, and while I'm tempted to say Elise, she and Sonic retconned themselves out of having met each other.
Context: https://sonic.fandom.com/wiki/Madonna https://sonic.fandom.com/wiki/Madonna_Garnet
Context: https://sonic.fandom.com/wiki/Madonna / https://sonic.fandom.com/wiki/Madonna_Garnet
Or 4.75 inches.
Or 4.75 inches.
"Dexter" would be Amy's fictional boyfriend from Sonic Chronicles: the Dark Brotherhood. https://sonic.fandom.com/wiki/Dexter

This line's intended as a way to properly address the "Rouge slept with Sonic" thing that comes up in the Amy/Amy masturbation lines. Since Amy Rose is seemingly unquestioning and okay with it at that stage, working in that plot point earlier should make it a bit less out-of-left-field.
"Intercourse" (noun): communication or dealings between individuals or groups. Alternatively, short for sexual intercourse.
Rouge and Amy never actually went THAT far, I'd expect; she's just taking the opportunity to tease.

Gee, this conversation's gonna be real awkward if someone ever decides to add Shadow somewhere down the line - or, heaven forbid, Maria herself. (Apparently, Sonic X gave her age as 12 years old, so she's just within the age-up range.)
Since I haven't read the manga, I don't know the context -- but the "Scarlet Queen" title is from when Revy briefly takes to the stage as a dominatrix again in Ch. 101.
...Honestly, I'm on the fence about keeping this line.

I do know that there's a strong possibility that Fina was artificially created. On top of that, though, I've learned from the wiki that - as a Silvite - Fina has a piece of the Silver Moon Crystal inside her. (Or... had? I don't know how the Moon Crystals being lost in Deep Sky factors into that.)

Rouge has never received an official backstory about her time before becoming a treasure hunter, so between that and her criminal tendencies, I figure she'd be deliberately cagey about her past. That said, I do have a general idea of a fanon backstory I've been using for her -- so if do you feel like prying into that, her lips would be loosest during her Finished stage.
Granted, human!Fluttershy wouldn't have lived through the events of Green Isn't Your Color...
It occurs to me that the answer to this question might vary depending on whether anyone else is exposed/masturbating/finished by this point in the game.

Delving into matters of species presents a number of challenges from a writing standpoint -- partly because I need to make sure what I write makes equal sense for both Rouge's default skin and her eventual canon/furry one, partly because there's not really an "official" collective name for Sonic's various animal-people (as far as the video game canon is concerned), and partly because Sega's aggressively non-committal nowadays about whether Sonic's world and the human world are the same planet or two different ones. (When Rouge said humans are rare "depending on where you go," that's because Adventure-era games showed a majority-human society, while the more modern ones instead show an exclusively-furry society with Dr. Eggman as the only human character.) Still, given that this stage *is* leading into a crotch reveal, deflecting the topic with some innuendo seems appropriate.
I suspect the triggering line was intended to have "rouge31" instead of "rogue31" as its marker.
Fluttershy is welcome to wave off the proposal, of course -- but this is a good opportunity for a joint pose if you're interested.
I suspect the triggering line was intended to have "rouge31" instead of "rogue31" as its marker.

With this line, I tried to steer the conversation in a way that wouldn't require a rewrite of Sucrose's preexisting "gem unto herself" line... though that has the side effect of deflecting Sucrose's questions once again. If you'd prefer Rouge to actually address them, I can rewrite this line (and/or the next one) or have her answer frankly in a Hand (Any) case.
At least, as far as Sonic Adventure 2 is concerned.

The stereotypical example is having sex on a big pile of money (concerns of practicality and hygiene aside), but naturally, there are a lot of ways to answer - including rejecting the underlying premise, if you think that'd be the most in-character.

This case is set up so that any loot Rouge collected during the game disappears from her model. While the implication I'm going for is that it went into Nami's bag, I believe it should be possible for a Pose Maker pose to pull the loot assets from Rouge's folder - so, if you're so inclined, you could have Nami wearing it all instead.
Of course, I know that's not how that works for Kwami (just look at Nooroo); Rouge is just hypothesizing based on what she's already familiar with.

Full disclosure? Even I haven't settled on an answer to this question (and it'd likely change depending on whether she's in humanoid or furry form) - but either she's naturally hairless, or she waxes. Incidentally, though, there are a number of porn artists who draw Rouge with fur on her legs, and sometimes even on her back & shoulders - but it's never really looked *right* to me.

Here's my idea on how to incorporate the joint pose for when Sucrose isn't around. That said, I haven't yet settled on what Rouge would want if Fluttershy loses, but I do have some ideas... Remind me to DM you about them. (Also, while this case is hidden for now, I'll unhide it once we've got the whole scenario planned out.)
The wiki tells me that Nami's mom is adoptive (and dead) -- but of course, Rouge doesn't know that.

I'm still debating the value of the first two lines in this case - while Rouge does make reference to the canonical style of (un)dress of other Sonic characters in her generics, they may need to change if any of the characters in question get added to SPNatI in the future. If you think dealing with that would be more trouble than it's worth, just let me know and I can delete those, leaving just the "Story" set of lines.

Some clarification: these would be anthropomorphic octopi (the IDW comics set a precedent for those with Mimic). And, while I'm leaving the exact details of how she resolved the situation to the imagination, Rouge *will* - if pressed - clarify that the sucker marks were simply from getting restrained, rather than anything sexual.
I haven't found any official dimensions for the Master Emerald - but Tikal is 95 cm (3'1") tall, and a screenshot from Sonic Adventure shows that the Emerald is roughly triple her height.
I suspect the marker for Perona's line should instead be "rouge12" - so if you plan to change it, please let me know.
I suspect the marker for Perona's line should instead be "rouge12" - so if you plan to change it, please let me know.

Since it seems tricky to continue this thread without also seeing Marinette's lines, I'll hold off for now - just gonna mark this case as orange so that I don't forget to follow up on it when the time comes. | UPDATE: the time hath come.
Note to self: make custom pose later.

Random thought that may or may not be relevant: if EqG Fluttershy is slightly aroused by the thought of nudity beneath a skintight suit, that gives some intriguing new context to her canonical swimsuit of choice.
Tomoko may not be an actual NEET, but she certainly looks the part.
May or may not be a placeholder, depending on if I can think up a topic
Hidden for now - I imagine that the Medici family would come up during the course of the prior stripping sequence, but if not, I'll come up with a new target for this case.

May or may not be a placeholder, depending if I can come up with a topic that'd naturally lead into the whole headlessness reveal. Will likely become clearer as the conversation during the prior stripping sequences progress.

Not sure how in-character it would be for Heris to actually be sneaking such glances at this stage, but since Rouge likes to tease, her intention is to fluster Heris regardless of the accusation's veracity or lack thereof.

Now that this line is obsolete, I'm marking this as Hidden, but keeping it in so that I can hold onto the conditions. Once she receives Leon's response to her rewritten 3-Stripping line, I'll rewrite this one, too.

Now that this line has been replaced, the following lines of Leon's should probably also be deleted or reworded: "...I'm only human, though. Any convincing arguments you wanna make...? I can see a few right now, you know. But maybe you like a guy completely at your disposal?" | "Sorry, Rouge. I know you're interested in some other... assets... I know of. You're a better flirt than me. But I can offer you a great night, either way. I am sorry." | "I don't mind using my mouth between your legs until you feel the apology is sufficient."
As you may already know, Rouge is referencing how spotted hyenas have pseudophalluses, while leeches and some slugs are true hermaphrodites.

If Toph accepts the bet, we could set up stakes for whoever loses. Of course, it needn't necessarily be something as extreme as, say, "loser eats the winner out" (I'd want to see what kind of chemistry they develop before committing to something so explicitly sexual)... It could be as simple as treasure for treasure, but if you have other ideas, I'm happy to brainstorm. (Then again, Toph might just as easily be too shrewd to take the bet.)

Because it has the potential to lead to a fun interaction, I set this line up to make sure that Rouge would say it relatively early in the game. Toph's response should still trigger with this case or the original one, so I don't think its conditions will need changing.

Since Rouge's first stripping sequence is the one where she takes her boobs out, I'm kind of obligated to reply to Toph's line in a way that logically transitions into that. (In this case, I'm thinking something along the lines of Rouge going, "here's a little sample of just how generous I can be" - only to realize after the fact that flashing the blind girl is hardly a winning strategy.) That said, if we want more time to explore the potential for earthbending jewel thieves (and I definitely do), I'll try to incorporate it into Rouge's targets toward Toph's stripping stages.
NOTE: I noticed I'd originally set this line to play on the wrong stage of Critical Darling's. I've just fixed it, but CD's response will need to be adjusted, too.
It's probably worth noting that Rouge is generalizing in her last point there... She hasn't had sex with Shadow, so she wouldn't know one way or the other in his particular case.
